cleaned_text: Rooted in your well being Holistic Natural Medical Services Holistic Natural Medical Services At Natural Medical Solutions Wellness Center, we use the most innovative naturopathic techniques to create a unique, customized platform for our patients. First, we look at the whole person to ensure we are taking the appropriate steps, getting to the root cause of your health issue. Mind, body, and spirit are important to the overall health of the physical body. We have used various tests, including [nutrients deficiency](https://www.natmedsol.com/nutrition-and-weight-loss.html), [thermography](https://www.natmedsol.com/thermography.html), and many more, to fit an individual's needs. Remember, two persons are not the same when we are treating them. We treat everyone with empathy as they are going through their process and road to recovery. The body can heal itself once it is given what's needed. God's body is made to heal itself naturally, and it starts with you. At Natural Medical Solutions, we are here to help. Dr. Gail Ravello has a Ph.D of Alternative and Integrative Medicine (Ph.D-IMD) from Quantum University and Is board Certified by the American Naturopathic Medical Certification Board (ANMCB). She is a highly skilled Naturopathic Doctor with over 29 years of experience in healthcare, working in both private practice and hospital outpatient care. Dr. Ravello is currently accepting new patients in the Roswell, Alpharetta, Atlanta, GA, area.
